trans-unit.source: Provides a control array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma matriz de controle <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controles.

trans-unit.source: The `ListViewArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `ListView` array.
trans-unit.target: O `ListViewArray` classe fornece um equivalente para a funcionalidade de tempo de execução de um Visual Basic 6.0 `ListView` matriz.

trans-unit.source: It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.
trans-unit.target: Ele não fornece os recursos de tempo de design de uma matriz de controle do Visual Basic 6.0.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the label for an item is edited by the user.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o rótulo para um item é editado pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: The `AfterLabelEdit` event occurs when the user finishes modifying the text for an item.
trans-unit.target: O `AfterLabelEdit` evento ocorre quando o usuário termina de modificar o texto de um item.

trans-unit.source: The new string that the user types for the item is passed to the event, and the event handler can reject the change.
trans-unit.target: A nova cadeia de caracteres que o usuário digita para o item é passada para o evento e o manipulador de eventos pode rejeitar a alteração.

trans-unit.source: If the event handler rejects the change, the text reverts to the text as it was before the user began editing the item.
trans-unit.target: Se o manipulador de eventos rejeitar a alteração, o texto é revertida para o texto como estava antes do usuário começou a editar o item.

trans-unit.source: In order for the `AfterLabelEdit` event to be raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListView%2A> control must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para que o `AfterLabelEdit` evento ser gerado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListView%2A>controle deve ser definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListView%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user starts editing the label of an item.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário começa a editar o rótulo de um item.

trans-unit.source: The `BeforeLabelEdit` event occurs when the user starts modifying the text for an item.
trans-unit.target: O `BeforeLabelEdit` evento ocorre quando o usuário começa a modificar o texto de um item.

trans-unit.source: If the event handler cancels this event, the user cannot change the text.
trans-unit.target: Se o manipulador de eventos cancelar esse evento, o usuário não pode alterar o texto.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to prevent the user from editing specific items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse evento para impedir que o usuário de edição de itens específicos a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to `false`, the `BeforeLabelEdit` event is not raised; all user attempts to change item labels are automatically rejected.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle é definido como `false`, o `BeforeLabelEdit` não é gerado; todas as tentativas de usuário para alterar os rótulos de itens serão automaticamente rejeitadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contents of the display area for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> in virtual mode has changed and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> determines that a new range of items is needed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o conteúdo da área de exibição para um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> no modo virtual foi alterado e o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> determina que um novo intervalo de itens é necessária.

trans-unit.source: Handling this event enables the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to update the item information held in cache so that it is readily available.
trans-unit.target: Permite a manipulação deste evento o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>atualizar as informações de item mantido em cache para que ele estará disponível.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> in a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> em uma <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray"> </xref> é clicado.

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event passes a <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler.
trans-unit.target: O `Click` evento passa um <xref:System.EventArgs>para seu manipulador de eventos.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Therefore it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, ele apenas indica que ocorreu um clique.

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar obter informações mais específicas mouse (botão, o número de cliques, rotação de roda ou local), use o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick>evento.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick> event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick>evento não será gerado se o clique é causado por ação que não seja o do mouse, como o pressionamento da tecla ENTER.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: Um clique duplo é determinado pelas configurações de mouse do sistema operacional do usuário.

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click instead of two clicks.
trans-unit.target: O usuário pode definir o tempo entre cliques de um botão do mouse que deve ser considerada um clique duplo em vez de dois cliques.

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event is raised every time that a control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: O `Click` é gerado sempre que um controle é clicado duas vezes.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event handlers for the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events of a [control](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm), the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events are raised when the control is double-clicked and both methods are called.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você tem manipuladores de eventos para o `Click` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>eventos de um [controle](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm), o `Click` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>os eventos são gerados quando o controle é clicado duas vezes e ambos os métodos são chamados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event, the `Click` event might be raised two times.
trans-unit.target: Se um controle é clicado duas vezes e que o controle não oferece suporte a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>evento, o `Click` evento pode ser disparado duas vezes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks a column header within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: The `ColumnClick` event occurs when the user clicks one of the column headers in a details view of the items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>).
trans-unit.target: O `ColumnClick` evento ocorre quando o usuário clica em um dos cabeçalhos de coluna em uma exibição de detalhes dos itens em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle (quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>estiver definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The `ColumnClick` event is typically handled to sort the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, using the clicked column as the column to sort by.
trans-unit.target: O `ColumnClick` evento normalmente é tratado para classificar os itens a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, usando a coluna clicada como a coluna para classificar por.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the column header order is changed.

trans-unit.source: The `ColumnReordered` event is a cancelable event and can be canceled by handling the event and setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O `ColumnReordered` evento é um evento cancelável e podem ser cancelado pela manipulação do evento e a configuração de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if the event is canceled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs> will not change to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se o evento é cancelado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs>não será alterado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event lets you customize the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using owner drawing.

trans-unit.source: It is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to `View.Details`.

trans-unit.source: This event can occur for each column header in the control.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento pode ocorrer para cada cabeçalho de coluna no controle.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: The `GiveFeedback` event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started.
trans-unit.target: O `GiveFeedback` é gerado quando uma operação de arrastar e soltar é iniciada.

trans-unit.source: By using the `GiveFeedback` event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Usando o `GiveFeedback` evento, a origem de um evento arrastar pode modificar a aparência do ponteiro do mouse para fornecer os comentários visuais do usuário durante uma operação de arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: The `Item` property is the default property for a control array.
trans-unit.target: O `Item` é a propriedade padrão para uma matriz de controle.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the following lines of code are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, as linhas de código a seguir são equivalentes.

trans-unit.source: ```vb# MsgBox(CStr(ListViewArray.Item(1).Text)) MsgBox(CStr(ListViewArray(1).Text)) ``` > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The `ItemActivate` event occurs when the user activates one or more items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: O `ItemActivate` evento ocorre quando o usuário ativa um ou mais itens a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The user can activate an item with either a single-click or double-click, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A> property, or with the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: O usuário pode ativar um item com um único clique ou clique duas vezes, dependendo do valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>propriedade, ou com o teclado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>

trans-unit.source: From within the event handler for the `ItemActivate` event, you can reference the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> properties to access the collection of items selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to determine which items are being activated.
trans-unit.target: De dentro do manipulador de eventos para o `ItemActivate` eventos, você pode fazer referência a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>Propriedades para acessar a coleção de itens selecionados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>para determinar quais itens estão sendo ativados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `ItemDrag` event occurs when the user begins dragging an item.

trans-unit.source: Typically the event handler for the `ItemDrag` event performs the task of dragging by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o manipulador de eventos para o `ItemDrag` evento executa a tarefa de arrastar chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform the tasks necessary to drag items into and out of your application's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse evento para executar as tarefas necessárias para arrastar itens dentro e fora de seu aplicativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Key events occur in the following order: `KeyDown` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event-handling method to `true`.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed and the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma tecla é pressionada e o controle tem foco.

trans-unit.source: Key events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> `KeyPress` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> The `KeyPress` event is not raised by non-character keys; however, the non-character keys do raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> events.
trans-unit.target: Principais eventos ocorrem na seguinte ordem: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> `KeyPress` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>o `KeyPress` evento não será gerado por caractere não chaves; no entanto, as chaves de caractere não gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>propriedade pressionamentos de tecla de exemplo em tempo de execução para consumir ou modificar um subconjunto de pressionamentos de tecla comuns.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event-handling method to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para manipular eventos de teclado somente no nível do formulário e não ativar os controles receber eventos de teclado, definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade do formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>método do manipulador de eventos para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um controle deve reposicionar seus controles filhos.

trans-unit.source: The `Layout` event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: O `Layout` evento ocorre quando controles filhos são adicionados ou removidos, quando os limites do controle será alterado e, quando ocorrerem outras alterações que podem afetar o layout do controle.

trans-unit.source: The layout event can be suppressed by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O evento de layout pode ser suprimido usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change.
trans-unit.target: Suspensão de layout permite executar várias ações em um controle sem a necessidade de executar um layout para cada alteração.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a `Layout` event.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você redimensiona e move um controle, cada operação geraria um `Layout` eventos.

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> `Leave` For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Quando você altera o foco, usando o teclado (guia, SHIFT + TAB e assim por diante), ou chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>método, os eventos focus ocorrem na seguinte ordem: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>quando você altera o foco, usando o mouse ou chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>método, os eventos focus ocorrem na seguinte ordem: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> `Leave` para obter mais informações sobre como manipular eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle é clicado com o mouse.

trans-unit.source: Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseDown> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Click> `MouseClick` <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseUp> Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event instead of the second `MouseClick` event.
trans-unit.target: Clicar em um botão do mouse quando o ponteiro está sobre uma forma normalmente gera a seguinte série de eventos do controle: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseDown> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Click> `MouseClick` <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseUp>dois cliques ocorrem feche suficiente no momento, conforme determinado pelas configurações de mouse do sistema operacional do usuário irá gerar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>eventos em vez do segundo `MouseClick` evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseUp> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Click> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> events are logically higher-level events of a control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>eventos são eventos logicamente, o nível mais alto de um controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Geralmente, eles são gerados por outras ações, como pressionar a tecla ENTER quando o controle tem foco.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como manipular eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer rests on the control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do mouse permanece sobre o controle.

trans-unit.source: A typical use of `MouseHover` is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle").
trans-unit.target: Um uso típico de `MouseHover` é exibir uma dica de ferramenta quando o mouse faz uma pausa em um controle dentro de uma área especificada ao redor do controle ("retângulo de foco").

trans-unit.source: The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A pausa necessária para este evento a ser gerado é especificada em milissegundos, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `MouseHover` event is defined and detected in connection with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O `MouseHover` evento é definido e detectado na conexão com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante uma operação de arrastar e soltar e permite que a fonte determinar se a operação de arrastar e soltar deve ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: The `QueryContinueDrag` event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: O `QueryContinueDrag` é gerado quando há uma alteração no estado de botão do teclado ou mouse durante uma operação de arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: The `QueryContinueDrag` event enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: O `QueryContinueDrag` evento permite que a fonte determinar se a operação de arrastar e soltar deve ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle é redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the <xref:System.EventArgs> data to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>do controle redimensionado, você pode converter o `sender` parâmetro o <xref:System.EventArgs>dados para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>e obter seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>propriedade (ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>propriedades individualmente).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.EventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout> event instead of the `Resize` event.
trans-unit.target: Para lidar com layouts personalizados, use o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout>eventos em vez do `Resize` evento.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout> event is raised in response to a `Resize` event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout>é gerado em resposta a um `Resize` evento, mas também em resposta a outras alterações que afetam o layout do controle.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> is in virtual mode and a search is taking place.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> está no modo virtual e uma pesquisa está ocorrendo.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is in virtual mode and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>está no modo virtual e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: When handling this event, you should calculate which item from the list of items supplied by the Items property matches the search criteria and set the `SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Index` property to the index of the ListViewItem.
trans-unit.target: Ao lidar com esse evento, você deve calcular a qual item da lista de itens fornecidos pela propriedade de itens corresponde aos critérios de pesquisa e conjunto de `SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Index` propriedade para o índice do ListViewItem.

trans-unit.source: If an item is not provided, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A> and FindItemWithText will return a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Se um item não for fornecido, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A>e FindItemWithText retornará uma referência nula (Nothing no Visual Basic).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Leave> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Leave> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> `Validated` If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> and `Validated` events are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Quando você altera o foco usando o teclado (guia, SHIFT + TAB e assim por diante), chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>métodos, ou definindo a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>para o formulário, os eventos focus ocorrem na seguinte ordem: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Leave><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>quando você alterar o foco, usando o mouse ou chamando o método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, os eventos focus ocorrem na seguinte ordem: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Leave><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> `Validated` se a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>está definida como `false` , o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating>e `Validated` eventos são suprimidos.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> event are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>é definido como `true` no <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating>delegado do evento, todos os eventos que normalmente seriam ocorrem após o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating>evento são suprimidos.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>
